alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 11:20AM EDT until March 14 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Williams. East Fork White River near Bedford. East Fork White River near Rivervale. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers due to rainfall last weekend. Minor flooding is occurring, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. The crest of the East Fork White River is nearing Shoals. The crest of the White River is nearing Petersburg. The crest of the Wabash River is nearing Riverton. Flooding will gradually end during the coming week at many sites, but may last into early next weekend along the far lower reaches of the Wabash and White Rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Williams. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.9 feet, Water now begins to cover State Road 450 at the Public Access Site just east of Williams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 1.7 feet Wednesday, March 23. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
